NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: Daz, I seem to be unable to access a conversation that I wrote using a projection stone.. Could there be an issue with the data stored within it? 2 1 DAZ: My love, I fear you may misunderstand the role of projection stones in remote conversations! 3 2 DAZ: Conversations shared across projection stones are recorded into the projection walls they are written on, not the projection stones themselves. 4 3 DAZ: Think of each projection stone as unique keys, and the projection walls as having locks for each key. 5 3 DAZ: To give an example: this conversation can only be viewed using a projection stone to the Scroll and Stone Workshop from the Construction Yard's projection wall, and vice versa! 6 5 CASSAVA: I see.. If that is the case, I shall need to test each projection stone on my projection wall to find those conversations I have lost! Workshop EX3 3
